version_description:
Sango finally added the new features that everyone will like, such as Lucky Packet、PK and so on. Besides, there are many new entertainments that you have never experienced. Come and check now:

New Features:
1. The Eid al-Adha activity is coming soon, Please look forward to it!
2.Added Bubble's world friends, go to meet new friends!
3.Added more entertainments in the room, Lucky bag、PK、Roulette!
4.Added Emoji on the mic, it's more fun to talk with friends!
5. You can send pictures in the room or by the Message
6.Added broadcast area in the home page, you will not miss the important news!
7.Added Room ranking、Charm ranking and Famous ranking in the home page!

Improving:
1. The room no longer limits the quantity of followers
2.Improved other functions

New Features:
1.Sign in function is online on the home page
2. Add dates entrance on Me page

Improving:
1. Reduced data consumption for voice chat
2. Optimized other experiences

New Features:
1. 5 and 10 mics are newly added to the room's mics number
2. PK is upgraded, supporters can also win gold coins too!
3. The store is open, go and buy your favorite decorations!
4. Newly added function for admins to clear the screen
5. Support admins to modify room information
6. Newly added fast speak for rooms, chatting dosen't need writting
7. Newly added function to room luck bag , the lucky bag falls by luck
Others:
1. [game] lucky big numbers will be online soon, and you will get ten million grand prizes!

New Features:
1. 5 and 10 mics are newly added to the room's mics number
2. PK is upgraded, supporters can also win gold coins too!
3. The store is open, go and buy your favorite decorations!
4. Newly added function for admins to clear the screen
5. Support admins to modify room information
6. Newly added fast speak for rooms, chatting dosen't need writting
7. Newly added function to room luck bag , the lucky bag falls by luck
Others:
1. [game] lucky big numbers will be online soon, and you will get ten million grand prizes!

WHAT'S NEW
1.Yay！There are exclusive special gifts for new user！
2.Personal homepage brand new revision.
3.New stranger list in the message center.
4.Upgrade the Private message report
5. UI Optimization:smoother operation and stunning visual design introduce better user experience to our users.

1、Apply for VIP card in The voice room can now! The VIP can enjoy a variety of privileges, update and check it!

There are more rules on the VIP card , please check "app - Room - VIP - "Apply for a VIP card"

2、 User seats recommendation on home page is added ,Check out Sango's great users or you can be one of them, update the new version and interact with us!

3、 New rankings

New Function
V2.5.1 update instructions
1. The option to the gift sending button and login failure feedback
2. The option to interactive prompts such as initial preloading and reminding after recharge
3. Added VIP function to enjoy unique membership rights
4. Add blocking words (anti-spam), expand the public chat area to support copying
5. The option to the pop-up window of the client, only limited to one pop-up per day
6. Improve user experience
7. Some bugs are fixed.

1.The Room background picture has been changed to a background more beautiful
2.Bugs have been fixed , improved product experience

1. Functional details optimization
2. Improve product experience

Added Grab stars game in the Room
Added Roulette game in the Room
Tribal online family system
Improved Tribal tasks UI
Added New languages and games entry on the home page
Improved the home page UI
Added New valuable gifts in the room
